AppenderInfo.AppenderDesc: The only difference between it and SMTPAppender is that rather than specify a SMTPHost parameter a PickupDir must be specified.\r\nThe PickupDir paramter is a path that must exist and the code executing the appender must have permission to create new files and write to them in this directory.\r\nThe path is relative to the application's base directory (AppDomain.BaseDirectory).

Argument.Name: SMTPHost
Argument.Description: Email SMTP Server's IP or URL.

Argument.Name: evaluator
Argument.Description: If a LevelEvaluator is specified with a threshold. This means that the events will only be delivered when a message with level of threshold or higher level is logged.
